Where Registration Gatekeeper option is configured, the user should be required to register/login (through LenovoID system) before the user can access the Store.
Upon accessing any page of a Store where Serial Number Gatekeepr option is enabled (eg. via a deeplink), the system should display a Serial Number authentication page to the user.
Upon accessing any page of a Store where Passcode Gatekeepr option is enabled (eg. via a deeplink), the system should display a Passcode authentication page to the use.
The Business User should be able to enable/disable (as a toggle) the option to perform Email Domain validation for Checkout.

For sites protected by the Referral URL Gatekeeper, where the user is deeplinking to the site, upon authenticating the user through the Referral URL the user should be forwarded to the original deeplink URL.
